text: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi
edit: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, vision, insight, ... thus, "That origin of suffering as a noble truth should be abandoned."
